name: projects.preferences
description: A Projects object is public by default, but portions of it can be set to private by modifying its preferences

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of Projects Preference options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite Projects Preference when found in request body

key_value_pairs.show_profile: show/hide profile in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_project_members: show/hide project_members in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_project_owners: show/hide project_owners in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_publications: show/hide publications in all interfaces (default: True)
